OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

TIO_NUM_THREAD.description: Number of threads to use for the connector.

TIO_API_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the Tenable API.

TIO_API_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for API requests in seconds.

TIO_API_BACKOFF.description: Time (in seconds) to wait before retrying after receiving a 429 response from the API.

TIO_API_RETRIES.description: Number of retries in case of failure.

TIO_EXPORT_SINCE.description: Date from which to start pulling vulnerability data.

TIO_MIN_SEVERITY.description: The minimum severity level of vulnerabilities to import (`low`, `medium`, `high`, `critical`).

TIO_MARKING_DEFINITION.description: Default marking definition for imported data (e.g., `TLP:AMBER`, `TLP:GREEN`, `TLP:CLEAR`).

TIO_NUM_THREADS.description: Number of threads to use for the connector.
